TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewButtonCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell

summary.span: 显示在 控件中使用的类似按钮的用户界面 (UI)。

span.span: Displays a button-like user interface (UI) for use in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是种特殊的类型的用于显示类似于按钮的 UI。The class is a specialized type of used to display a button-like UI. 专门用于保存此类型的单元格的列类型。 is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type. 默认情况下函数将初始化为一个新。By default, the is initialized to a new . 若要在列内的单元格模式的现有后，设置该列的属性设置为要用作一种模式的单元格。To pattern the cells within a column after an existing , set the column's property to the cell to use as a pattern. 若要响应用户单击按钮，处理或事件。To respond to user button clicks, handle the or event. 在事件处理程序，可以使用属性以确定是否发生单击的按钮列。In the event handler, you can use the property to determine whether the click occurred a the button column. 可以使用属性来确定单击是否发生特定按钮单元格。You can use the property to determine whether the click occurred in a particular button cell. 列的单元格相关的属性都是相似的属性的模板单元格的包装。The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell. 更改模板单元格的属性值将只影响单元格基于模板在更改后添加。Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change. 更改列的单元格相关属性值，但是，将更新模板单元格和列中的所有其他单元格，如有必要刷新列显示。Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary. > [!NOTE] > 当启用了可视样式时，使用绘制按钮列中的按钮，和单元格样式指定通过属性如不起作用。When visual styles are enabled, the buttons in a button column are painted using a , and cell styles specified through properties such as have no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对特定的行执行操作。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to perform actions on particular rows. 使用个人时，可以使用类似的代码对象。You can use similar code when working with individual objects. 在此示例中，事件处理程序将首先确定是否单击在按钮单元格，然后检索与行关联的业务对象。In this example, a event handler first determines whether a click is on a button cell, then retrieves a business object associated with the row. 此示例中提供一个更大示例摘自[如何： 访问 Windows 窗体 DataGridViewComboBoxCell 下拉列表中的对象](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/access-objects-in-a-wf-datagridviewcomboboxcell-drop-down-list.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Access Objects in a Windows Forms DataGridViewComboBoxCell Drop-Down List](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/access-objects-in-a-wf-datagridviewcomboboxcell-drop-down-list.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding/CS/form1.cs#100)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding/vb/form1.vb#100)]

span.para: 派生自并将新属性添加到派生类，请确保重写方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。此外应调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格。

When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations. You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

summary.span: 创建此单元格的精确副本。

span.span: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
An that represents the cloned .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写方法时从派生并将新属性添加到派生的类。Override the method whenever you derive from and add new properties to the derived class.

span.para: 重写时派生类中调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格，并确保也将复制的派生类中添加的任何属性的值。

When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

summary.span: 获取或设置确定按钮外观的样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style determining the button's appearance.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置所属列的属性还会设置列显示属性中的列和刷新每个单元格。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要重写每个单元格的指定的值，设置单元格的值后设置列的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性，它是类似于此属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property, which is similar to this property. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#10)]

returns.span: 的值；或者，如果 为 ，则为所有者列的 值。

span.span: The value of the or the value of the owning column if is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于检索共享该行，它不能本地存储单元格值并保持共享状态的单元格的文本。This method is useful to retrieve the text of a cell in a shared row, which cannot store cell values locally and remain shared. 因为共享的行的索引为-1，必须传递的实际行索引。You must pass in the actual row index because shared rows have indexes of -1. 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前调用方法方法。The method is called just before the method. 它必须返回`true`如果在调用具有相同参数的效果的行取消共享已`rowIndex`。It must return `true` if the call to with the same argument has the effect of unsharing the row `rowIndex`. 它应返回`false`否则为。It should return `false` otherwise. 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 激活通过 SPACE 键，则此方法更新单元格的用户界面 (UI)。When activated by the SPACE key, this method updates the cell's user interface (UI). 此方法是类似于方法。This method is similar to the method. 在同一环境中调用引发事件，但不会实际引发该事件。It is called in the same circumstances in which a event is raised, but it does not actually raise the event.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，此值指示所属列的文本是否出现在由单元格显示的按钮上。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the owning column's text will appear on the button displayed by the cell.

value.span: 如果 属性的值能自动匹配所属列 属性的值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value of the property will automatically match the value of the property of the owning column; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按钮的单元格显示为按钮的文本。The of a button cell is displayed as text on the button. 属性可以是将设置每个单元格的按钮文本，或者可以使用所有按钮单元格的父列的属性值。The property allows you to either set the button text for each cell, or to use the property value of the parent column for all of the button cells. 设置所属列的属性还会设置列显示属性中的列和刷新每个单元格。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display. 若要重写每个单元格的指定的值，设置单元格的值后设置列的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#010](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#010)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#010](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#010)]
